main event: On August 20, 1968, a report of an unidentified flying object was submitted from Middletown, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 40 minutes., The report was insufficient for a detailed investigation., The object was observed visually from the ground., The object was described in various related reports including one about a bright light moving erratically., Witness descriptions included a hovering metallic shape and sudden high-speed movement.
witness description: The witness was a civilian who reported observing the object from the ground.
